output.sankey_title: Industry of graduate employment for 2012/13 academic year graduates of Agriculture, food and related studies one, three and five years after graduation (YAG), male and female Level 8 graduates from English HEIs, APs and FECs, 2018/19 tax year.
output.sankeytext1:
For  both female and male ,  Level 8  graduates who studied Agriculture, food and related studies , the industry with the highest
                      proportion of graduates one year after graduation is  Education  ( 55.5 %), and at five years after graduation it is  the same  ( 45.9 %).
output.sankeytext2:
The most movement between one and three years after graduation is seen for Education, where 2,030 graduates move to Human health and social work activities. Between three and five
                       years after graduation it's seen for Accommodation and food service activities where2,485 graduates moved to Education.
